Articles.Content:
It keeps stuck at "Loading Kerbal Roster Data"  when I am trying to start the campaign. The only way to solve the problem is to change your Windows to English if it is not in English. There must be an official patch for it.

If the language you use has non-English letters like uppercase "i" = "İ" etc., this bug appears. On main menu screen I see SINGLEPLAY button like S□NGLEPLAY. I think this is why there is a problem verifying in-game texts. This is why the game gets stuck on the loading screen.
